com.optiontown.app.view.customview.OTTex.android:text: 1 passenger(s) can book and fly with this Pass. At least 1 passenger must be added while buying the Flight Pass. All other passengers must be added to the Flight Pass within 24 hours of buying the Pass.
Book flights at anytime up to 7 days before travel.
You can choose 2 consecutive travel dates and you will be awarded any flight in that period.
*Includes all taxes and fees except for admin fee.
You may choose to pay only a small amount now and rest later with easy installments.
To choose a flexible payment plan or know more, login below and go to next page.

*At least 1 passenger must be added now to purchase the Flight Pass.
